title: Adult human small intestine cell dissociation (on ice)
original description: Protocol for human small intestine cell dissociation, performed on ice to reduce artifact gene expression.
steps:
1. While excluding as much PBS as possible, weigh out tissue using Mettler.
2. After weighing out tissue, transfer to petri dish on ice and mince tissue using grinding motion with razorblade for 2-3 minutes.
120s
3. After tissue is minced finely, add 1 mL enzyme mix per 28 mg of tissue to the petri dish and pipet minced tissue + enzyme into 1.5 mL tube (on ice). 
1amount
4. Start timer. Leave tube on ice - initially shake vigorously to break up the tissue, 3-
5x every 30-45 seconds for 5 minutes.
300s 
30s
5. Now, when big chunks are broken up, shake every 1 minute while leaving on ice for 5 additional minutes (10 minutes total time).
300s 
60s
6. After 10 minutes total digest time, triturate the digest mix 10X using p1000 set to 700 µL.
7. Continue shaking every minute for 5 additional minutes (15 minutes total time). 
300s 
60s
8. After 15 minutes digest time, triturate digest mix again 10X and spin digest mix at 90 G for 30 seconds at 4 °C.
30s 
4temperature
9. Remove supernatant (80%) containing single cells and filter using 30 μM filter while leaving chucks on bottom; rinse filter with 10 mL PBS/BSA into 50 mL conical (on ice) to save single cells.
10amount
10. To residual chunks of tissue add additional 1 mL of enzyme (per 28 mg tissue).
1amount
11. Shake vigorously 3-4X every minute for 10 additional minutes (25 minutes total time). 
600s 
60s
12. Triturate again 10X using 1 mL pipet set to 700 µL.
13. Continue to shake vigorously every minute for 5 minutes additional time (30 minutes total time). 
300s 
60s
14. Triturate again 10X and filter using the same 30 μM filter and rinse with 10 mL PBS/BSA into the same 50 mL conical (on ice).
10amount
15. Divide flow-through into 2 15 mL tubes.
16. Spin 600 g for 5 minutes at 4 °C.
4temperature 
300s
17. Carefully remove supernatant - re-suspend both pellets in 100 µL total PBS/BSA in one of the 15 mL conicals.
100amount
18. Add 700 μL RBC lysis buffer to 100 μL PBS/BSA (800 μL total). Triturate 20X using 1 mL pipet.
700amount 
100amount
19. Incubate for 3 minutes on ice.
180s
20. Add 10 mL of PBS/BSA to 15 mL conical to dilute the RBC lysis buffer. 
10amount
21. Spin 600 G for 5 minutes at 4 °C. 
300s 
4temperature
22. Remove supernatant.
23. Briefly re-suspend cells in a small volume of PBS/BSA and check to ensure that there are no more RBCs present.
24. Re-suspend in 10 mL total PBS/BSA in the same 15 mL conical.
10amount
25. Spin 600 g for 5 minutes at 4 °C. 
4temperature 
300s
26. Remove supernatant and re-suspend in a small volume of PBS/BSA to check cell concentration.
27. Analyze quantity and viability of cells using a hemocytometer with trypan blue: add 10 µL of trypan blue to 10 µL of cell suspension, mix by pipeting and pipet into hemocytometer; for Chromium, make concentration to 1 million cells per mL. For DropSeq, make concentration to 100,000 cells/mL.
ai_generated_description: This molecular biology protocol aims to dissociate adult human small intestine cells while keeping the samples on ice to reduce artifact gene expression. The isolated cells can then be utilized for further analysis, such as Chromium and DropSeq applications.

# Protocol steps
weigh_tissue(tissue="small intestine", method="Mettler")
mince_tissue(tissue="small intestine", time=120)
add_enzyme_mix(tissue_weight="28 mg", enzyme_ratio="1 mL per 28 mg")
shake_samples(initial_time=300, subsequent_time=30, num_of_shakes=3, total_time=300)
shake_samples(initial_time=300, subsequent_time=60, num_of_shakes=5, total_time=300)
triturate_sample(num_of_triturations=10, pipet_amount=700)
shake_samples(initial_time=300, subsequent_time=60, num_of_shakes=5, total_time=300)
triturate_sample(num_of_triturations=10, pipet_amount=700)
spin_sample(sample="digest mix", settings="90 G, 30 seconds, 4 °C")
filter_and_rinse(sample="digest mix supernatant", filter_size="30 μM", rinse_volume="10 mL PBS/BSA")
add_enzyme_mix(tissue_weight="28 mg", enzyme_ratio="1 mL per 28 mg")
shake_samples(initial_time=600, subsequent_time=60, num_of_shakes=6, total_time=600)
triturate_sample(num_of_triturations=10, pipet_amount=700)
shake_samples(initial_time=300, subsequent_time=60, num_of_shakes=5, total_time=300)
triturate_sample(num_of_triturations=10, pipet_amount=700)
filter_and_rinse(sample="digest mix supernatant", filter_size="30 μM", rinse_volume="10 mL PBS/BSA")
divide_flow_through_volumes(sample_volume="in 50 mL conical", num_of_divisions=2)
spin_sample(sample="flow through", settings="600 G, 5 minutes, 4 °C")
resuspend_pellet(pellet="cell pellet", buffer_volume="100 µL PBS/BSA")
add_lysing_buffer(sample="resuspended pellet", lysing_buffer_volume="700 μL RBC lysis buffer")
triturate_sample(num_of_triturations=20, pipet_amount=1000)
incubate_cells(incubation_params="on ice, 180 seconds")
add_PBS_BSA(container="15 mL conical", buffer_volume="10 mL PBS/BSA")
spin_sample(sample="with diluted lysis buffer", settings="600 G, 5 minutes, 4 °C")
remove_supernatant_pellet(sample="15 mL conical")
check_RBC_presence(sample="resuspended pellet", cells_to_look_for="RBCs")
resuspend_pellet(pellet="cell pellet", buffer_volume="10 mL PBS/BSA")
spin_sample(sample="in 15 mL conical", settings="600 G, 5 minutes, 4 °C")
remove_supernatant_pellet(sample="15 mL conical")
analyze_quantity_viability(sample="resuspended pellet", hemocytometer_params="10 µL trypan blue, 10 µL cell suspension")
# end of protocol
